title: Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop
meta_description: Learn the calories in a dum dum lollipop (about 25 kcal), plus carbs, sugars, and full nutrition details for this small treat.
h1: Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop
assumptions: Standard Dum Dums lollipop (3.5 g), hard candy type, no wrappers or sticks included in nutrition.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A single Dum Dum lollipop contains about 25 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a dum dum lollipop?
What are the carbs in a dum dum?
faqs.a: About 6 g total carbs, all from 5 g sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a dum dum have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's primarily sugar-based candy.
At 25 kcal each, they're a small indulgence but add up if eaten in multiples.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in a dum dum?
faqs.a: Flavors have negligible impact; all standard Dum Dums are around 25 kcal.
